snippet: A leap in the number of Indian students taking the Graduate Record Examinations suggests a continuing surge in the number entering American graduate schools.

byline.original: By VIMAL PATEL | THE CHRONICLE OF HIGHER EDUCATION

lead_paragraph: A leap in the number of Indian students taking the Graduate Record Examinations suggests a continuing surge in the number entering American graduate schools.

headline.main: More Indian Students Taking U.S. Graduate School Test
headline.print_headline: More Indian Students Taking U.S. Graduate School Test
